title: House Hunting in Italy—What Goes With Red Wine?
text:
Wine and real estate are vying for attention in the Tuscan province of Siena, a hilly, rustic enclave between Florence and Rome.

The area, associated with some of Italy’s most acclaimed red wines, made news when New York-based Wine Spectator magazine announced that a quarter of its top-20 2018 releases were produced there. description: Vineyards that produce exceptional red wines and the alluring real estate that surrounds them have all eyes on the Province of Siena
